field.label: Mode
field.help: This option selects the way packets are routed to other daemons

field.label: Network
field.help: This machines internal address to use and network mask for the whole network

field.label: PingTimeout
field.help: The number of seconds to wait for a response to pings or to allow meta connections to block. If the other end doesn't respond within this time, the connection is terminated, and the others will be notified of this.

field.label: StrictSubnets
field.help: When this option is enabled tinc will only use Subnet statements which are present in the host config files in the local /etc/tinc/netname/hosts/ directory. Subnets learned via connections to other nodes and which are not present in the local host config files are ignored.

field.label: Cipher
field.help: The symmetric cipher algorithm used to encrypt UDP packets. Any cipher supported by OpenSSL is recognised. Furthermore, specifying "none" will turn off packet encryption. It is best to use only those ciphers which support CBC mode

field.label: path MTU Discovery
field.help: When this option is enabled, tinc will try to discover the path MTU to this node. After the path MTU has been discovered, it will be enforced on the VPN.

field.label: Debug
field.help: set debug output for this tinc network.

field.label: Hostname
field.help: The hostname for this machine in the network

field.label: Ext. Port
field.help: This machines external port to use

field.label: Subnet
field.help: This machines part of the network

field.label: Private key
field.help: Private key for this host in the network (leave empty to generate)

field.label: Public key
field.help: Public key for this host in the network (leave empty to generate)
